nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures: Destroyer Down is a graphic novel in the canon comic book anthology series Star Wars Adventures. The book was written by Scott Beatty, and it contains the stories "Destroyer Down" and "The Ghost Ship." Star Wars Adventures: Destroyer Down was published as a Loot Crate exclusive on December 20, 2017 by IDW Publishing, and it was reprinted as a comic book miniseries and trade paperback in 2018 and 2019.
